attributes.action: Don't have another EU referendum - Brexit won and that's democracy.
attributes.additional_details: 52% of voters voted Brexit - that's quite a few 10's of millions. Need I say anymore?
attributes.background: We went to the polls, voted and won. Pro EU need to accept that a democratic vote took place and they lost, the vast majority of people don't want to be governed by unexpected people, we demand that our politicians are answerable to the people who pay their wages.
